To create an effective post, add a cover photo. Upload 16:9 aspect ratio pictures for the best view.
Maximum file size is 1MB.

texts.ArticleRequestsDescription: Want to see a specific content here? You can ask the community to create it!
texts.NewsletterEmailDefinition: Get information about happenings in ABP, such as new releases, free sources, posts, and more.
texts.CommunityPrivacyPolicyConfirmation: I agree to the Terms & Conditions and Privacy Policy.
texts.PostRequestMessageTitle: Open an issue on GitHub to request a post/tutorial you want to see on this website.
texts.PostRequestMessageBody: Here's a list of the requested posts by the community. Do you want to write a requested post? Please click on the request and join the discussion.
texts.CreatePostLanguageInfo: The language for the post content.
texts.CreateGithubPostUrlInfo: Full URL of the Markdown file on GitHub (example).
texts.CreateVideoContentUrlInfo: Original Youtube URL of the post.
texts.CreateExternalPostUrlInfo: Original External Url of the post.
texts.ThankYouForContribution: Thank you for contributing to the ABP Community. We accept articles and video tutorials on ABP Framework, .NET, ASP.NET Core and general software development topics.
texts.GithubPostSubmitStepOne: 1. Write a post on any public GitHub repository with the Markdown format. example
texts.GithubPostSubmitStepTwo: 2. Submit your post URL using the form.
texts.GithubPostSubmitStepThree: 3. Your post will be rendered in this website.
texts.YoutubeVideoSubmitStepOne: 1. Publish your video on YouTube.
texts.YoutubeVideoSubmitStepTwo: 2. Submit the video URL using the form.
texts.YoutubeVideoSubmitStepThree: 3. Visitors will be able to watch your video content directly on this website.
texts.ExternalContentSubmitStepOne: 1. Create content on any public platform (Medium, your own blog or anywhere you like).
texts.ExternalContentSubmitStepTwo: 2. Submit your content URL using the form.
texts.ExternalContentSubmitStepThree: 3. Visitors are redirected to the content on the original website.
texts.ChooseYourContentType: Please choose the way you want to add your content.
texts.PostContentViaGithub: I want to add my post with GitHub in accordance with the markdown rules.
texts.PostContentViaYoutube: I want to share my videos available on Youtube here.
texts.PostContentViaExternalSource: I want to add the content I published on another platform here.

texts.TwitterUserNameValidationMessage: Your Twitter username can not include whitespace, please make sure your Twitter username is correct.
texts.LinkedinUrlValidationMessage: Your LinkedIn URL can not include whitespace, please make sure your LinkedIn URL is correct.
texts.MinimumSearchContent: You must enter at least 3 characters!

texts.MemberNotPublishedPostYet: This member hasn't published any posts yet.
texts.Discord_Page_Announce: We are happy to announce ABP Community Discord Server!
texts.Discord_Page_Description_1: ABP Community has been growing since day one. We wanted to take it to the next step by creating an official ABP Discord server so the ABP Community can interact with each other using the wonders of instant messaging.
texts.Discord_Page_Description_2: ABP Community Discord Server is the place where you can showcase your creations using ABP Framework, share the tips that worked for you, catch up with the latest news and announcements about ABP Framework, just chat with community members to exchange ideas, and have fun!
texts.Discord_Page_Description_3: This ABP Community Discord Server is the official one with the ABP Core Team present on the server to monitor.
texts.Events_Page_MetaDescription: The live shows, hosted by the ABP Team, are casual sessions full of community content, demos, Q&A, and discussions around what's happening in ABP.
texts.Members_Page_WritingFromUser: Read writing from {0} on ABP Community.
texts.Post_Create_Page_MetaDescription: Create your post for sharing your experiences about the ABP framework and contributing to the ABP Community.
texts.Post_Index_Page_MetaDescription: ABP Community's purpose is to create a contribution environment for developers who use the ABP framework.
texts.Layout_MetaDescription: A hub for ABP Framework, .NET, and software development. Access articles, tutorials, news, and contribute to the ABP community.
texts.Index_Page_CommunityIntroduction: This is a hub for ABP Framework, .NET and software development. You can read the articles, watch the video tutorials, get informed about ABP’s development progress and ABP-related events, help other developers and share your expertise with the ABP community.
texts.IConsentToMedium: I consent to the publication of this post at https://medium.com/volosoft.
texts.AbpCommunityTitleContent: ABP Community - Open Source ABP Framework
texts.CommunitySlogan: A unique community platform for ABP Lovers
texts.NoActiveRaffleTitle: No active raffle is available at the moment.
texts.NoActiveRaffleDescription: No active raffle is available at the moment.
texts.RaffleSubscriptionCodeInputMessage: This raffle requires a registration code. Please enter the registration code below:
texts.RaffleSubscriptionCodeInputErrorMessage: The registration code is incorrect. Please try again.
texts.RaffleJoinSuccessMessage: You are successfully registered for the raffle. You will be informed via email if you win the prize!
texts.RaffleLoginAndRegisterMessage: You must sign in to join this raffle! If you haven't registered yet, create an account for free now.
texts.SponsoredConferencesDescription: We are honoring to support .NET communities and events for software developers.
texts.UpcomingCommunityTalkEventDescription: The live shows, hosted by the ABP Team, are casual sessions full of community content, demos, Q&A, and discussions around what's happening in ABP.
texts.UpcomingConferenceEventDescription: ABP .NET Conference is a virtual event for the .NET Developer community to come together and listen to talks about the .NET world, common software development practices and the open source ABP Framework.
texts.RafflesInfo:
This is the raffle page dedicated to show our appreciation towards you for being an active Community Member. We do ABP Community Talks ,ABP .NET Conference, attend or sponsor to the .NET-related events in which we give away some gifts.

You can follow this page to see the upcoming raffles, attend them, or see previous raffles we draw including the winners.

Thank you for being an active member! See you in the upcoming raffles.
texts.VisitVideoCourseDescription: If you want to learn the basics of the ABP Framework, check out the ABP Essentials Video courses.
texts.ConfirmEmailForPost: To be able to post, you need to confirm your email. Go to account.abp.io/Account/Manage and verify your email in the Personal Info tab.
texts.DailyPostCreateLimitation: You have reached the daily post creation limit. You can create a new post in {0}.
